title: Crown roast lamb with red wine sauce
ingredients: ['For the crown', '4 large sprigs fresh rosemary', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme', '10 cloves garlic, minced', '4 to 6 tablespoons salted butter', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 (400g) racks lamb ribs (8 cutlets on each)', 'For the red wine sauce', '2 large shallots, finely sliced', '150ml red wine', '150ml lamb stock', '2 tablespoons redcurrant jelly', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint leaves']
